p.k: In a peaceful coastal town, Ben must not only face the archaic antagonist Steam Smythe and his latest creation – the Clocktopus – but also his deepest, darkest fear: squids! / During a stop at the superstore Shoppë, Ben and Gwen are transformed into babies by nanny-gone-nuts Nanny Nightmare. / Ben must go alien to save the Hoover Dam from disaster, but when tough guy hero Tim Buktu swoops in to “help”, Ben must figure out if Tim is friend… or foe. / Ben, Gwen, and Max go on a tour of the impervious Fort Knox, but when Dr. Animo sicks a hungry ani-mutate on the Fort, Ben must stop it. / Ben and Gwen are excited to attend an Earth Day EDM concert in Portland until the show is hijacked by the sound-manipulating baddy Lord Decibel.
